CLAUDE.md

This file provides guidance to Claude Code (claude.ai/code) when working with code in this repository.

Project Overview

DomenaRynku.pl is a Polish-language financial analytics portal for the Warsaw Stock Exchange (GPW). Built with Quarto (static site generator) + R for data analysis, hosted on Netlify. The site features proprietary market indicators, company dashboards, and a blog.

Build & Render Commands

# Render entire site (generates _site/ folder)
quarto render

# Render a single page
quarto render spolki/lbw.qmd

# Live preview with hot-reload
quarto preview

After changes to _quarto.yml (navbar, styles, meta tags), render the entire project — not individual files.

Data Pipeline (R scripts, .gitignored)

Run in order from the R console:

source("R/get_prices2.R")          # Fetch stock prices from Stooq
source("R/calc_trend_index.R")     # Calculate market breadth index
source("R/calc_price_index.R")     # Calculate equal-weighted price index
source("R/data_sentiment_prep.R")  # Polish market sentiment
source("R/data_sentiment_prepEN.R") # USA market sentiment

Deployment

  1. Render locally (quarto render)
  2. Commit _site/ to git and push
  3. Netlify auto-deploys from _site/ — no server-side build

Critical: _site/ is committed to git (not in .gitignore). Netlify serves it directly.

What’s in .gitignore

R/, mod/, scripts/, data/, _freeze/, .quarto/ — all private. R scripts and data files exist only locally.

Architecture

  • _quarto.yml — Central config: navbar, theme (cosmo), SEO headers, GTM/Klaro consent
  • styles.css — Custom branding (blue gradient navbar, card hover effects)
  • klaro-config.js — GDPR cookie consent (analytics OFF by default)
  • _language-pl.yml — Polish UI translations

Content sections

Directory Content Format
spolki/ 16 company dashboards (Phase 1) Quarto Dashboard
indeksy/ Proprietary market indices (breadth, equal-weighted) Standard .qmd
sentyment-rynku/ Market sentiment (Poland, USA) Standard .qmd
posts/ Blog articles (YYYY-MM-DD-title/index.qmd) Blog post
data/ Processed .RDS files (gitignored) R data
R/ Data processing scripts (gitignored) R scripts

Company dashboards (spolki/)

All use the LBW template (reference layout): - Header row (8%): ticker, company name, HQ, website, sector/subsector - Left column (22%): value boxes — price, daily change %, yearly change % - Right column (78%): tabset — Notowania (price chart + SMA200), O spółce, Biznes, Strategia - Footer: legal disclaimer

Data source: data/prices100.RDS (historical OHLCV for top 100 GPW stocks).

Code Style Rules (STRICT)

Quarto Dashboards (.qmd)

  • Use Markdown headers (#, ##, ###) for layout (rows/columns/tabs)
  • FORBIDDEN: ::: {.card}, ::: {.column} divs — headers only
  • Lists must be preceded by a blank line (\n\n before * Item)
  • Tabs: use {.tabset} on a column header, then lower-level headers for tab names

R Code

  • Tidyverse style, snake_case
  • Native pipe |> preferred over %>%
  • Wrap scraping in purrr::possibly() (no formula syntax: possibly(read_html, otherwise = NA))
  • Module system: box::use(mod/gpw)

Content & Tone

  • Neutral, objective language — no investment advice
  • Polish-language content (interface and analysis)
  • Every analysis page must end with a legal disclaimer blockquote
  • Use neutral phrasing: “Dane sugerują…”, “Warto zwrócić uwagę na…” — never “Kup!”, “Gwarantowany zysk”

File Naming Conventions

Type Convention Example
Quarto pages kebab-case indeks-trendow-gpw.qmd
Blog posts YYYY-MM-DD-title/index.qmd 2024-11-21-analiza-trendow/
R scripts snake_case calc_trend_index.R
Data files snake_case index_trend.RDS

Key Technical Notes

  • freeze: auto in _quarto.yml — only re-executes R code when source changes; pure markdown files always re-render
  • Consent Mode v2 defaults all tracking to denied (GDPR-first) — GA4 only fires after Klaro consent
  • Avoid reticulate/Python in .qmd files — can cause hanging processes
  • SEO metadata (description, keywords) should be in each .qmd YAML header
  • Existing comprehensive docs: DOKUMENTACJA_PROJEKTU_DOMENARYNKU.md (Polish, 680+ lines), AGENTS.md (quick reference)
